name: Ava
description: Ava is a perfectionist who manages the grocery store with meticulous care.
She enjoys keeping the store spotless but has a quirky habit of rearranging items unpredictably.
Though slightly introverted, Ava connects deeply with a few trusted individuals.
Her routine is structured, balancing work and occasional leisure.
example_day_plan: 07:00 am: stock shelves and rearrange items
10:00 am: help customers and manage transactions
12:00 pm: lunch at the back of the store
01:00 pm: organize inventory and clean the store
05:00 pm: close the store and head home
06:00 pm: cook dinner and relax with a book
08:00 pm: organize personal notes and plans
